put.summary: Create a booking lease for the given UUID (any UUID will do)

delete.summary: Deletes a lease for a booking

put.summary: Create an order quote (lease) for the given UUID

delete.summary: Deletes an order quote (lease) for the given UUID

patch.summary: Cancels an order (booking) for the given UUID and voids any existing invoices

put.summary: Create an order for the given UUID

get.summary:
Returns all participation for specified sites on a date which
can be of type swipe / product sale / booking. Token is taken from the response of the initial call
and returns the next batch of data
